ruling: - If you have 2 copies of [[Cliff the Trap Remover]] (for example) in your hand, you can Special Summon 1 of them with [[Mustering of the Dark Scorpions]]. You can Special Summon him even if you already have [[Cliff the Trap Remover]] on your side of the field from before you activated [[Mustering of the Dark Scorpions]].
- You don't have to Special Summon all possible monsters with [[Mustering of the Dark Scorpions]]; you can keep some in your hand if you want.
- If your opponent chains [[Ring of Destruction]] to [[Mustering of the Dark Scorpions]] to destroy your [[Don Zaloog]], [[Mustering of the Dark Scorpions]] still resolves.
